Greetings to Swedish king
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 4 sent a message of greetings to Carl Gustaf, king of the Kingdom of Sweden, on its national day.
 The message congratulated him and the Swedish people and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to expand and develop.
